description: I was responsible for food tech project refactoring and implementing new features. Also I had a mature project which I had to set up and develop from a scratch, in a team from 2 BE, 2 FE, 1PM and 1 QA.

I was creating web application for internal product purposes from a scratch. Including setting up project structure, technologies stack, SEO and other features. Was working with large multinational team consisting from designers, marketers and engineers from Denmark, Indonesia, Ukraine and USA.

I was responsible for multiple different projects from different districts such as crypto, healthcare, design and other domains. Had a deal with multiple small teams mostly from 3 to 6 people including developers, product owners, designers, and managers.
I was part of an outstaff team who was included into multiple different projects mostly short termed and existing ones. Worked on widgets, restyling and refactoring for an old projects.
